website_summaries.verdict: Energy efficient and easy on the eyes – both visually and physically – this mid-priced monitor provides an immersive experience for multiple uses.
pros: Crisp, clear picture and brilliant colors
Incorporates touch switches instead of buttons
Many users have purchased the first one, then bought another to use as a second monitor for work or gaming
Low gloss, with very little reflection from overhead lighting
cons: The stand can be a bit wobbly if not on a solid surface

customer_reviews.title: Great Monitor
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best monitors you could get in terms of price for performance. I was able to get this for $100 during the Black Friday sale. After a month of using I can say this monitor is definitely worth the price. Be sure to read the description well and know what you're getting. Pros- -Great Picture -1080p -Gaming Mode -Nice size Cons- -Only two inputs( VGA and HDMI) -No Audio In or Out -60 Hz (its okay honestly) Overall a great product if you have a small budget or just looking for an extra monitor.
customer_reviews.author: bryant cruz

customer_reviews.title: Monitor broke after 8 months
customer_reviews.text: This monitor worked fine for a while, but after 8 months, the HDMI port stopped working. It began flickering off and on, then eventually the monitor stopped connecting to any computer. I tried different cables, everything, no dice. It seems cheaply made, which I did not expect from Samsung. I recommend spending a little more for a better-constructed monitor.
